title: Pieces Of A Chasuble, 17th century
medium:
medium: silk,linen, metallic
Technique: two integratd structures; 2/1 twill with supplementart wefts and supplementary warp in 2/2 twill plus supplementary metallic weft
description: Ogee lattice with lancet leaves in yellow, red and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pieces Of A Chasuble, 17th century.
17th century. medium: silk,linen, metallic
Technique: two integratd structures; 2/1 twill with supplementart wefts and supplementary warp in 2/2 twill plus supplementary metallic weft. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-856-a,b.
